content.question: Which of the following factors was most likely responsible for the change in Chicagoâ€™s population from 1950 to 1990 ?

choices.label: Migration to the suburbs and surrounding regions
Decreasing birth rates among city dwellers
Continued racial discrimination in urban public housing

content.answer: Migration to the suburbs and surrounding regions
